Package com.cscie97.store.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICommand
    Top level interface for all of the commands
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCommand
    Establishes some common features for all commands
    AssistCustomerCommand
    When a customer carries more than 10lbs, he may call for assistance.
    CheckAccountBalanceCommand
    Checks if customer has enough balance to purchase what he has in his basket
    CheckoutCommand
    This command gets called when a customer approaches a turnstile trying to exi
    CleanStoreCommand
    This class is a prompt for cleaning.
    CommandFactory
    This class implements the factory design pattern.
    CreateAccountCommand
    Creates a new block chain account
    CreateLedgerCommand
    Initializes ledger
    CustomerEnteredCommand
    This happens when a customer tries to enter store
    CustomerNeedsItemCommand
    This command gets called when a customer has trouble finding a product
    CustomerSeenCommand
    This command is called when cameras sense the movement of a customer or through voice recognition and a customer's location need to be updated
    EmergencyCommand
    This command gets called during emergency.
    FIndCustomerCommand
    Locates missing person in the store
    InvokeCommandsCommand
    This command forces all commands in the queue to execute
    ProcessTransactionCommand
    Commits transactions between accounts
    ProductAddedToBasketCommand
    Similar to product removed from basket command, this command is called to keep inventory count in sync and to track items in a basket
    ProductRemovedFromBasketCommand
    Similar to product added to basket command, this command is called to keep inventory count in sync and to track items in a basket
    StoreControllerService
    This class is a concrete observer that knows about the state of the Store Model Service when it changes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StoreControllerServiceException
    An exception thrown by the store controller service
